definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Chapter three discusses some problems of SVS in syntactic dimension.
sentences.chinese: 第三章论述连动句的句法平面中的若干问题。

sentences.english: Chapter one expounds upon the history and present situation of the studies on SVS .
sentences.chinese: 第一章对连动句研究的历史和现状进行了评述。

sentences.english: Chapter four discusses some problems of SVS in semantic dimension.
sentences.chinese: 第四章论述连动句的语义平面中的若干问题。

sentences.english: Then, angels appeared, and made the monster motionless.
sentences.chinese: 接着，天使们就来了，他们让冰怪连动都动不了。

sentences.english: Three rows of even the "dynamism" of the mobile flowers, tension, stronger, intensity is better.
sentences.chinese: 三排连动网花，拉力更强，强度更好。

sentences.english: Upper and lower die design of synchronized lifting Linked bar.
sentences.chinese: 上下模设计连动倒杆同步升降。

sentences.english: My ears were hurting and I could hardly move my fingers at all.
sentences.chinese: 我的耳朵疼得厉害，手上的指头连动都动不了。

definition: to be unable to move a single step
to not move a single jot (idiom)
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
